headings.usage: Use for all page titles, card headers, and metric values. Tight tracking (-0.02em) for a technical feel.

body.usage: Use for tables, inputs, and long-form text. Optimized for legibility at small sizes.

mono.usage: Use for VIN numbers, IDs, and technical specs.

primary.description: The main brand color. Used for primary buttons, active states, and key highlights. MUST be configurable via Admin Panel.

secondary.description: Used for subtle backgrounds and secondary actions.

accent.description: Used for hover states and subtle highlights.

destructive.description: Used for delete actions and critical errors.

structure.sidebar: Fixed width (280px), collapsible. Dark mode by default for contrast or matching brand theme.
structure.topbar: Sticky, glassmorphism effect. Contains Global Search, Notifications, and User Profile.
structure.main_content: Scrollable area with max-width constraints for readability on large screens.

instructions_to_main_agent.branding_implementation: CRITICAL: Do not hardcode colors. Use the CSS variables defined in tailwind.config.js. Create a 'ThemeContext' or 'BrandingProvider' that fetches the agency configuration and updates the root CSS variables (document.documentElement.style.setProperty('--primary', newColor)).
instructions_to_main_agent.layout_strategy: Use a 'DashboardLayout' component for pages 2-11. Use a 'AuthLayout' for page 1. The DashboardLayout must have a collapsible sidebar and a sticky topbar.
instructions_to_main_agent.charts: Use 'recharts' with the Shadcn Chart component wrapper. Ensure charts use the CSS variable colors for consistency.
instructions_to_main_agent.tables: Use '@tanstack/react-table' for the Inventory and CRM tables to handle sorting and filtering efficiently.
instructions_to_main_agent.forms: Use 'react-hook-form' + 'zod' for all forms (Login, Agency CRUD, Car CRUD). Wrap them in Shadcn Form components.
instructions_to_main_agent.ai_integration: For the AI Prompt Editor, use a large textarea with syntax highlighting if possible, or a clean monospaced font area. Provide a 'Test Prompt' button next to it.
instructions_to_main_agent.whatsapp_ui: For the Conversations page, replicate the 3-pane layout of WhatsApp Web: List of chats (left), Active chat (center), Contact Info (right - collapsible).
instructions_to_main_agent.testing: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, rows). Format: 'page-section-element-action' (e.g., 'login-form-email-input').

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
